scripts.demo:resume:
echo '
Task 20 Demo: Custom Resume Generation
After dev starts, open /resume on the port shown in the terminal.
Enter a Job ID (check DB or let it drift) and click Enhance.
' && npm run dev
scripts.demo:task-16:
echo '
Demo Task 16: Architecture & Setup
After dev starts, open the home page on the port shown in the terminal.
' && npm run dev
scripts.demo:task-17:
echo '
Demo Task 17: N8N & Job Scraping
After dev starts, open /jobs on the port shown in the terminal and verify seeded jobs appear.
' && npm run dev
scripts.demo:task-18:
echo '
Demo Task 18: Map Interface
After dev starts, open /map on the port shown in the terminal and interact with map pins.
' && npm run dev
scripts.demo:task-19:
echo '
Demo Task 19: Job Pipeline
After dev starts, open /pipeline on the port shown in the terminal and drag items.
' && npm run dev
scripts.demo:task-21:
echo '
Demo Task 21: Settings & Configuration
After dev starts, open /settings on the port shown in the terminal and toggle tabs/fields.
' && npm run dev
scripts.demo:task-22:
echo '
Demo Task 22: Responsive UI
Resize the window and toggle dark mode.
' && npm run dev
scripts.demo:task-23:
echo '
Demo Task 23: Audit Process
Running audit simulation...
' && echo 'Audit passed (Simulation)'
scripts.demo:task-24:
echo '
Demo Task 24: Core Routes
After dev starts, navigate to /jobs, /settings, /dashboard on the printed port.
' && npm run dev
scripts.demo:task-25:
echo '
Demo Task 25: Mock Mode
Starting in MOCK MODE...
' && NEXT_PUBLIC_MOCK_MODE=true npm run dev
scripts.demo:task-26:
echo '
Demo Task 26: E2E Tests
Running Playwright tests...
' && echo '(Playwright not yet configured)'
scripts.demo:task-27:
echo '
Demo Task 27: ATS Scoring
After dev starts, open /resume on the printed port and click Analyze ATS Compatibility.
' && npm run dev
scripts.demo:task-28:
echo '
Demo Task 28: Qdrant Integration
After dev starts, open /settings on the printed port and check Database Status.
' && npm run dev
scripts.demo:task-29:
echo '
Demo Task 29: Resume Builder 2.0
After dev starts, edit Master Profile at /profile, then generate at /resume on the printed port.
' && npm run dev
scripts.demo:task-30:
echo '
Demo Task 30: Design System
After dev starts, open /design-system on the printed port.
' && npm run dev
scripts.demo:task-31:
echo '

After dev starts, open the home page on the printed port.
' && npm run dev
scripts.demo:task-32:
echo '
